Container.Name: FTB Genesis
Container.Overview: FTB Genesis Modded Minecraft Server[br][br][b]FTB Genesis[/b][br]Suspended in a corrupt simulation, your people need you to restore Elyria's habitat free them from the decaying digital landscape. Mutated monsters and irradiated wastelands stand between you and the fate of a world on the precipice of extinction.[br]Version tags available:[br] - 1.6.1[br] - 1.6.0[br] - 1.5.0[br] - 1.4.0[br] - 1.3.2[br] - 1.3.1[br] - 1.3.0[br] - 1.2.2[br] - 1.2.1[br] - 1.2.0[br] - 1.1.1[br][br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

Config.Name: Installed Location
Config.Description: Path to store the installed server files.

Config.Name: EULA
Config.Description: Do you agree to the Mojang EULA available at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula? Server will not start without accepting. Set to 'true' to accept.

Config.Name: OPS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability

Config.Name: LEVEL
Config.Description: Name of the world directory. It is usually world.
